review: The doctor was good but slightly impolite. I went for the treatment of cough, cold and insomnia. The medicine given by him is good.

********* ******,total my family treted well,I am suffer diabatic since 10 years,after 5 years I went  this doctor last 5 years doctor srikar sir treatment very well before 5yers back I am using insulin I went srikar sir now I am using only tablets and control' my sugar levels, and so many times my family suffering with fever and cold and coughing doctor treted very we'll and control very less medicine
Spending more time in understanding the problem will help, it would be better if doctor explains why the problem might occur & what could be the best way to avoid it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i have consulted the doctor various times for high fever and cold,cough (for me and my family)..very happy with the treatment and the explanation that he provided..thank you sir.
